title: The impact of market premium, firm size, and book to market ratio towards excess portfolio return in Indonesian manufacturing sector
abstract: This research is done for filling the of Fama French Three- Factor Model in Indonesian manufacturing aims to answer the applicability of Fama Three-Factor Model toward the variation of portfolio return as well as which market book to market ratio, or firm has influence return. Through judgement the research uses 99 companies as its sample from manufacturing companies from July 2010-2016 was into and analyzed using multiple analysis. From the research, it can be concluded that Three model on only 25% variation of portfolio return. Market premium, firm and book to market ratio simultaneously have significant impact on portfolio return for almost all regressions. Individually, market premium has insignificant impact on portfolio returns all regression. Meanwhile, book to market ratio and individually has significant impact on portfolio return for almost all regression.
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 34010285/MAN/2017; Billy Ong ( (34413016), Nathan Gondo Hartono (34413068)
